extendedInfo.description: EBSCOhost databases and discovery technologies are the most-used, premium online information resources for tens of thousands of institutions worldwide. This free app ensures that users get the most from searching premium EBSCOhost database content, provided courtesy of your library. The convenience and rich functionality of the app enables users to:â¢Choose which databases to searchâ¢Limit results to full text or peer reviewedâ¢Sort by relevance or dateâ¢Retrieve full text results in HTML and/or PDF formatsâ¢Save results for offline access at a later dateâ¢Email results to self or othersâ¢Automatically save 25 most recent searchesâ¢View cover flow display of results To use the EBSCOhost app, access EBSCOhost as you typically would via your library website or corporate intranet. Click the link at the bottom of any EBSCOhost page to email yourself the key to the app.

reviews.title: Does the minimum, and gets the job done adequately
reviews.comment: Yes, it allows you to search for articles and download them. Without the ability to sign into an account it loses much of its functionality. Would be nice to have this option to make use over different platforms seamless. Also, the UI could use an update to reduce the pixelation.
reviews.author: Jason Wallis

reviews.title: Great automatic authentification
reviews.comment: with the college\'s credentials. Nice. Streak 5\" 2.3.3
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Its ok
reviews.comment: Really wished it was like the website so Id have access to other important articles and reviews for my research on the go for school. Being a mom, going to college, and holding a fulltime job having an all access app for my research on the go would be awesome. But unfortunately this app doesn\'t provide that.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: overall ok
reviews.comment: Generally ok, doesnt work in landscape mode and personally need the ability to log in (as on the website )to get existing saved articles but is good for quick info
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Can\'t authenticate
reviews.comment: Wish this worked, but I\'ve tried 3x & can\'t get it to authenticate. Hopefully tech support will be able to assist, if so I will update my review.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A student\'s best friend
reviews.comment: As a busy student always of the bus or at work this app is a life saver! Sure, its not perfect but its saves me an amazing amount of time.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Flaky and hideous
reviews.comment: Stop trying to be an iPhone app! It is unreliable and very slow, the website works much better which is sad.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: OK
reviews.comment: It\'s nice to have this app, but it could be a lot better. There\'s no advanced search, it doesn\'t like to work in landscape mode, and on my Xoom at first it didn\'t work right at all, until I told Android to zoom instead of stretch it, and then put it back to stretch. The good news is that Firefox can deal with the web version just fine.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice app but needs revisions!
reviews.comment: The help instructions on how can I authenticate my app is kinda hard to follow, so I gave up ay my first try. I logged-in on their \"website search database\" and saw the mini advertisement / announcement below regarding this app for the android and iphone. And to my surprise, its really fast to authenticate the app! I hope you could make authenticating easier like just asking for the username and password and not by sending these instructions to email. Also I hope you could put the citation styles here!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Thank you
reviews.comment: Is the Cochrane Library next in your agenda? Would be lovely to have it as android app 24/7 to a hand!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Graphics
reviews.comment: need improve on the manual and many of the options seem to be just a pictures manual. It useful when I used and no fc on me.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I love you
reviews.comment: I am a librarian,  and I use ebsco constantly.  I am also always on the move,  so this app is a godsend.  I\'ll work through the bugs.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Help with install
reviews.comment: To get it authenticated make sure you sent ebsco an email from your institution email address or it won\'t work. Got email through mine and it works perfectly. Ready to try it!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: miserable experience
reviews.comment: 2 different network connections and 2 different browsers later, the authentication key still did not work. If I was lucky, I got a server error message from EBSCO. The utility of this app is limited anyway, since one cannot access EBSCOhost\'s ebooks, but not even the app itself works on my Nexus 7.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pathetic
reviews.comment: Allows you to do nothing other than search. EBSCO is worthless on android. Can\'t view books in the web browser can\'t download books with Bluefire and can\'t view them in their own app. What a tremendous waste.
reviews.author: John Ethridge

reviews.title: \"pdf download failed\"
reviews.comment: I get access to thousands of sources but I have been unable to save or download a single article. I am greeted with the message I put in the title. What is the problem? I am running firmware 2.2 since no higher is available for my phone. Can you fix this??
reviews.author: Matthew Rodriguez

reviews.comment: I\'m not able to access the help page, just keeps loading. Says to see message @ bottom of page, but none to be seen
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Disappointing
reviews.comment: After spending half an hour trying to figure out how to read an article I have given up. The help section is useless. The screen shots provided in the \"how to read an article\" look nothing like the actual screen. And just for clarification, the full text of the article I am trying to read IS available on the website.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Poor
reviews.comment: No advanced search, and the basic search works less well than the web site.
reviews.author: Nick Brown

reviews.title: Very Fast and Usefull
reviews.comment: It works faster than browser version. The most usefull app for those who does research day and night!
reviews.author: A Google User
